# FaB Stats

> Flesh and Blood TCG match tracker and statistics platform.

FaB Stats is a free, fan-made web application for tracking Flesh and Blood Trading Card Game match history, statistics, and tournament performance.

## Features

- **Match Tracking**: Log wins, losses, and draws with hero, opponent, format, and event details.
- **GEM Import**: Import match history directly from the official GEM (Game Event Manager) tournament system via a Chrome extension or userscript.
- **Statistics Dashboard**: View overall win rate, hero matchups, opponent records, event breakdowns, venue stats, and streak tracking.
- **Leaderboard**: Public leaderboard with categories including Win Rate, Most Matches, Streaks, Event Wins, Hero Variety, Hero Loyalty, Rated, and Hot Streak.
- **Public Profiles**: Share your stats with the community at fabstats.net/player/{username}.
- **Achievements & Mastery**: Earn badges and track hero mastery progression.
- **Event Badges**: Automatic recognition for ProQuest, Battle Hardened, Road to Nationals, and other official event types.

## Formats Supported

- Classic Constructed
- Blitz
- Draft
- Sealed
- Living Legend
- All official Flesh and Blood formats

## Technical Details

- Built with Next.js (static export)
- Firebase Authentication and Firestore
- Hosted on Netlify
- Chrome extension for GEM data import
